{{Wired embedded system |brand=On Networks |model=PL200S |revision=v2 |upc=606449094411 |ean= |asin=B00BECKNFA |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.06 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=4C:60:DE }} ''Powerline 200 Home Network Adapter'' Sold in a pack of two as the [[http://www.on-networks.com/products/powerline/pl200.aspx On Networks PL200]]
[http://support.on-networks.com/product_details/PL200 Support Page] These devices would seem to be identical to the [[Netgear XAV1301]] besides casing differences ('''On Networks''' is a '''Netgear''' brand). :.. as such, these things would appear to be '''Broadcom''' based.
